game.name: Star Mountain
game.categories: Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Shared/Split Screen PvP, Shared/Split Screen, Cross-Platform Multiplayer, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Custom Volume Controls, Keyboard Only Option, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Star Mountain is a fast paced pvp platformer where you must race to get a star before your opponent. Build your own platforms, and block your opponent to get to the star first! Featuring character customization, online and local multiplayer, and full controller support.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Star Mountain is a fast paced pvp platformer where you must race to get a star before your opponent. Build your own platforms, and block your opponent to get to the star first! Featuring character customization, online and local multiplayer, and full controller support.
